text: ni khux khamphir thi rea di hı lng ma xanpen khamphir thi mi khwam careiy thi yunyan sing sung xyu yeuxng hna khamphir ni læa pheux thi cea ca di takteuxn mæ hæng meuxng thanghlay læa phu thi xyu rxb «mæ meuxng nan læa brrda phu thi sraththa tx prlok nan phwk khea yxm sraththa tx khamphir ni læa khna deiywkan phwk khea k ca raksʹakar lahmad khxng phwk khea
